actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-330, by Ms. Matsui.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 1852 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. A specified amendment is in order.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 115.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 650.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 191 (Roll no. 871).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 190 (Roll no. 872).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1852) to modernize and update the National Housing Act and enable the Federal Housing Administration to use risk-based pricing to more effectively reach underserved borrowers, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 1852 (Expanding American Homeownership Act of 2007).

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1852) to modernize and update the National Housing Act and enable the Federal Housing Administration to use risk-based pricing to more effectively reach underserved borrowers, and for other purposes.
